- âœï¸ Update links and change navigation structure ([0bfd27d](https://dev.azure.com/if-it/If%20Design%20Hub/_git/ids-core/commit/0bfd27d1ba89a5ab24f43111185ec77a4f368e84)), closes [#490579](https://dev.azure.com/if-it/If%20Design%20Hub/_boards/board/t/If%20Design%20Hub%20Team/Stories/?workitem=/490579)

### BREAKING CHANGES

- ğŸ§¨ The scope for If Design System npm packages has now changed from
`@if-design-system` to `@ids-core`. We have also renamed the repository
from `if-design-system` to `ids-core`
- ğŸ§¨ We have now changed the navigation structure for the documentation site.
Please update any saved links!
- ğŸ§¨ Navigation structure has now changed. Please see release notes!

Navigational Card instead, which is based on the old Studio Crosslinks

removes the old colors from the code completely.
